summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-fourth (24) Avenue North from Helen Street to East Galer Street, and Turner Way from Twenty-third (23) Avenue North to Twenty-fourth (24) Avenue North; all in the City of Seattle; by grading and curbing the same in accordance with the prayer of the petition filled with the Comptroller of the City of Seattle; being file no. 30403, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
